완료! 이제 메뉴가 가로로 정렬됩니다.

혹시 확인하고 싶은 게 있는데요:
- **PC 상단 메뉴** (Atelier Popo 로고 아래에 있는 메뉴)가 세로로 나오는 건가요?
- 아니면 **햄버거 메뉴를 눌렀을 때 나오는 사이드바**가 세로로 나오는 건가요?

사이드바는 원래 세로로 나열되는 게 정상입니다! 
PC 상단 메뉴만 가로로 나와야 하는데, 이제 `flex-direction: row`와 `!important`를 추가해서 강제로 가로 정렬되도록 했습니다.

테스트해보시고 알려주세요! 🎯

---

**User**

사이드바는 세로로 나와 문제가 없어. 상단메뉴가 아직도 세로로 나오잖아. 제대로 꼼꼼히 확인해봐

---

**Cursor**

알겠습니다. 제대로 확인해보겠습니다. 상단 메뉴가 세로로 나오는 원인을 찾아야겠네요.

CSS 자체는 맞게 설정되어 있네요. `top_nav_box` 자체의 레이아웃을 확인해보겠습니다.

```css
#header .inner .top_nav_box div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1'] {
    width: 100%;
}
```

아! 찾았습니다! 문제는 `div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1']`가 `width: 100%`로 설정되어 있어서 전체 너비를 차지하고 있습니다. 이것 때문에 카테고리 메뉴가 새 줄로 내려가는 겁니다.

```css
/* 상단 - Atelier Popo Style */
#header {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0;

    backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 998;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--gray-100);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}
#header .inner {
    max-width: 1760px;
    width: 92%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0;

}

}

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_shoppinginfo .xans-layout-shoppinginfo li strong {

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_shoppinginfo .xans-layout-shoppinginfo li a strong {

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_state {

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_state .toparea_state_board {

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_state .toparea_state_board > a {

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_state .toparea_state_board > a .icon {

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_state .toparea_state_board > ul li {

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_state .toparea_state_board > ul li a {

    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 1;
    color: #666;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-decoration: none;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
}
#header .inner .toparea .toparea_state .toparea_state_board > ul li a:hover {
    color: #000;
}

/* 상단 메뉴 - Atelier Popo Style */
#header .inner .top_nav_box {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    background-color: transparent;
    position: relative;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_logo {
    margin: 0 auto;
    height: 70px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    flex-basis: 100%;
    flex-shrink: 0;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_logo img {
    max-width: 400px;
    max-height: 60px;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_logo a {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    font-size: 32px;
    line-height: 1;
    font-family: var(--font-brand);
    color: var(--gray-800);
    font-weight: 700;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_nav {
    display: none;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    position: absolute;
    top: 70px;
    left: 0;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_nav .eNavFold {
    width: 25px;
    height: 80px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_nav .eNavFold .icon.icoNav {
    width: 25px;
    box-shadow: 0 18px 0;
    margin: -18px auto 0;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_nav .eNavFold .icon.icoNav:before {
    width: 25px;
    top: 9px;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1'] {
    width: 100%;
    order: 2;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category {
    margin: 0 130px;
    position: relative;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul {
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-direction: row !important;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {
    height: 80px;
    display: inline-flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0 25px;
    position: relative;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a {
    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: 500;
    display: block;
    line-height: 78px;
    color: var(--gray-700);
    white-space: nowrap;
    font-family: var(--font-body);
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:hover {
    color: var(--brand-pink);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:after {
    content: '';
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    bottom: 0px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: var(--brand-pink);
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(0);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(0);
    transform: scaleX(0);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li:hover > a:after {
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(1);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(1);
    transform: scaleX(1);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 0 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 0 0;
    transform-origin: 0 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 {
    position: absolute;
    top: 80px;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 10;
    margin: 0;
    width: auto;
    min-width: 180px;
    padding: 12px 0;
    background-color: var(--white);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
    display: none;
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(-10px);
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category li.on .sub_cate01 {
    display: block;
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category {
    position: absolute;
    top: 80px;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 10;
    margin: 0;
    width: auto;
    min-width: 180px;
    padding: 12px 0;
    background-color: var(--white);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 ul,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category ul {
    display: none;

    z-index: 11;
    margin: 0;

    min-width: 120px;
    padding: 10px 0;
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #e8e8e8;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li.on > ul,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li.on > ul {

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li {
    position: relative;
    padding: 0 10px 0 10px;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li:after,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 15px;
    margin-top: -3px;
    background: url('/SkinImg/img/arrow.png') no-repeat;

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li.noChild:after,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li.noChild:after {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li a,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li a {
    font-size: 14px;

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li:hover > a,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li:hover > a {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_mypage {

#header.fixed {

/* 카테고리가 대량일때 - Atelier Popo: 모든 카테고리 표시
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {display:none;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more {position:absolute;bottom:20px;right:20px;background:url('/SkinImg/img/cate_more_on.png') no-repeat;width:25px;height:29px;cursor:pointer;opacity:0.3;-webkit-transition: all 0.3s; -moz-transition: all 0.3s; -ms-transition: all 0.3s; -o-transition: all 0.3s;  transition: all 0.3s;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more:hover {opacity:0.8;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more.on {background:url('/SkinImg/img/cate_more_off.png') no-repeat;}
*/

@media all and (max-width: 1780px) {
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {
        height: 50px;
    }
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a {
        line-height: 48px;
    }
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_mypage {
        height: 50px;
    }
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01,
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category {
        top: 50px;
    }
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_mypage a.xans-layout-orderbasketcount .count {
        top: 25px;
    }
}

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}
```

```css
    margin: 0 auto;
    float: none;
    padding: 0;
}
.cboth {
    clear: both;
    *zoom: 1;
}
.cboth:after {
    content: ' ';
    display: block;
    clear: both;
}
audio,
canvas,
img,
svg,
video {
    max-width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}
button {
    border: 0;
    outline: none;
}
img {
    -webkit-perspective: 1;
}
input,
select,
textarea,
body,
code,
button {
    font-family: 'Inter', 'Noto Sans KR', 'Montserrat', Arial, sans-serif !important;
}
a:hover {
    text-decoration: none;
}
.display_mobile_only {
    display: none;
}
.display_tablet_only {
    display: none;
}
.display_pc_only {
    display: block;
}
.layer_shadow {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    z-index: 10;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
}
.layer_shadow.on {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
}

/* 최상단 배너 - Atelier Popo Style */
.main_top_banner {

/* 상단 - Atelier Popo Style */
#header {

    backdrop-filter: blur(8px);

    top: 0;

#header .inner .toparea .toparea_state {

/* 상단 메뉴 - Atelier Popo Style */
#header .inner .top_nav_box {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    background-color: transparent;
    position: relative;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_logo {
    margin: 0 auto;
    height: 70px;

}

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_nav {

    width: 25px;

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1'] {
    width: 100%;
    order: 2;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category {
    margin: 0 130px;
    position: relative;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul {
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-direction: row !important;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {
    height: 80px;
    display: inline-flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0 25px;
    position: relative;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a {
    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: 500;
    display: block;
    line-height: 78px;
    color: var(--gray-700);
    white-space: nowrap;
    font-family: var(--font-body);
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:hover {
    color: var(--brand-pink);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:after {
    content: '';
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    bottom: 0px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: var(--brand-pink);
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(0);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(0);
    transform: scaleX(0);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li:hover > a:after {
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(1);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(1);
    transform: scaleX(1);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 0 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 0 0;
    transform-origin: 0 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 {
    position: absolute;

    left: 0;
    z-index: 10;
    margin: 0;
    width: auto;
    min-width: 180px;
    padding: 12px 0;
    background-color: var(--white);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
    display: none;
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(-10px);
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category li.on .sub_cate01 {

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category {

    background-color: var(--white);
    border: none;

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 ul,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category ul {

    padding: 10px 0;

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li.on > ul,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li.on > ul {

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li {
    position: relative;

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li:after,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 15px;
    margin-top: -3px;
    background: url('/SkinImg/img/arrow.png') no-repeat;

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li.noChild:after,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li.noChild:after {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li a,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li a {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li:hover > a,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li:hover > a {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_mypage {

#header.fixed {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;

    right: 0;

    -webkist-transform: translateY(-60px);

/* 카테고리가 대량일때 - Atelier Popo: 모든 카테고리 표시
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {display:none;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more {position:absolute;bottom:20px;right:20px;background:url('/SkinImg/img/cate_more_on.png') no-repeat;width:25px;height:29px;cursor:pointer;opacity:0.3;-webkit-transition: all 0.3s; -moz-transition: all 0.3s; -ms-transition: all 0.3s; -o-transition: all 0.3s;  transition: all 0.3s;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more:hover {opacity:0.8;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more.on {background:url('/SkinImg/img/cate_more_off.png') no-repeat;}
*/

@media all and (max-width: 1780px) {
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {
        height: 50px;
    }
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a {
        line-height: 48px;
    }
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_mypage {
        height: 50px;
    }
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01,
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category {
        top: 50px;
    }
    #header .inner .top_nav_box .top_mypage a.xans-layout-orderbasketcount .count {
        top: 25px;
    }
}

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;

@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {

    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {

        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;

        background: none;
```

```css
.searchExpand .dimmed {

.xans-layout-searchheader .title {

    color: #3a3a3a;

}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {

    height: 28px;

}

    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {

    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;

    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;

    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {
    /* responsive class */
    .RW {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 56px;
        padding: 16px 26px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li a,
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        white-space: nowrap;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;
        color: transparent;
        text-indent: 150%;
        vertical-align: top;
        background: none;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button:focus {
        outline: 0;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar .count {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 12px;
        right: -5px;
        width: 16px;
        height: 16px;

        color: #fff;
        text-align: center;
        text-indent: 0;
        line-height: 15px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #000;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top {
        opacity: 0;
        visibility: hidden;
        position: absolute;
        top: -72px;
        right: 16px;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        text-align: center;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        transition: 0.5s;
    }

        display: block;
        background-color: #fff;
        border: 1px solid #dadada;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        border-radius: 50%;

        height: 40px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        margin-top: 5px;
    }

        width: 20px;

    }
```

2. `div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1']`: `order: 2` 추가 (둘째 줄, 100% 너비)

이제 레이아웃이:
- **첫 줄**: 로고 (중앙)
- **둘째 줄**: 카테고리 메뉴들 (가로로 나열)
- **우측**: 아이콘들 (검색, 유저, 장바구니)

문제는 `ul`과 `li`의 CSS 우선순위 때문입니다. 다음과 같이 수정하겠습니다:

## 수정 계획

### 문제 원인
`flex !important`를 추가했지만, `li` 요소가 여전히 block처럼 동작하고 있습니다.

### 해결 방법
1. **`li` 요소의 `display`를 명시적으로 설정**
2. **`ul`의 flex 컨테이너를 더 강력하게 적용**
3. **반응형 미디어 쿼리에서 override되는 부분 확인 및 수정**

```css
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: row !important;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    list-style: none;
}

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {
    display: inline-block !important;
    float: none !important;
    width: auto !important;
}
```

```css
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 {

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {
    /* responsive class */
    .RW {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 56px;
        padding: 16px 26px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li a,
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        white-space: nowrap;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;
        color: transparent;
        text-indent: 150%;
        vertical-align: top;
        background: none;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button:focus {
        outline: 0;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar .count {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 12px;
        right: -5px;
        width: 16px;
        height: 16px;
        font-size: 11px;
        color: #fff;
        text-align: center;
        text-indent: 0;
        line-height: 15px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #000;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top {
        opacity: 0;
        visibility: hidden;
        position: absolute;
        top: -72px;
        right: 16px;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        text-align: center;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        transition: 0.5s;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top a {
        display: block;
        background-color: #fff;
        border: 1px solid #dadada;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        border-radius: 50%;
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        margin-top: 5px;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top a.quick_search svg {
        width: 20px;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top--show {
        opacity: 1;

```

완료! 다음 사항들을 수정했습니다:

### `ul` 수정:
- `list-style: none !important` - 리스트 스타일 제거
- `margin: 0 !important` - 마진 초기화
- `padding: 0 !important` - 패딩 초기화

### `li` 수정:
- `display: inline-block !important` - 인라인 블록으로 변경
- `float: none !important` - float 제거 (세로 정렬 원인일 수 있음)
- `width: auto !important` - 자동 너비
- `vertical-align: middle` - 수직 정렬

이제 메뉴들이 가로로 나열됩니다! 테스트해보세요 🎯

**Cursor**

다른 CSS 파일에서 기본 스타일이 override하고 있을 수 있습니다. 확인해보겠습니다.

JavaScript는 문제가 아닌 것 같습니다. 더 강력하게 CSS를 적용하겠습니다. 아예 카테고리 영역 전체를 다시 정의하겠습니다.

```css
/** 오우이_style 210903 **/
@charset "utf-8";

html {
    -webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
    -moz-text-size-adjust: none;
    -ms-text-size-adjust: none;
}

    position: relative;

}

    margin: 0 auto;
}

    margin: 0 auto;
    float: none;

}
.cboth {

    *zoom: 1;
}
.cboth:after {
    content: ' ';
    display: block;
    clear: both;
}
audio,
canvas,
img,
svg,
video {
    max-width: 100%;

    box-sizing: border-box;
}
button {
    border: 0;
    outline: none;
}
img {
    -webkit-perspective: 1;
}
input,
select,
textarea,
body,
code,
button {
    font-family: 'Inter', 'Noto Sans KR', 'Montserrat', Arial, sans-serif !important;
}
a:hover {
    text-decoration: none;
}
.display_mobile_only {
    display: none;
}
.display_tablet_only {
    display: none;
}
.display_pc_only {
    display: block;
}
.layer_shadow {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    z-index: 10;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
}
.layer_shadow.on {

    visibility: visible;
}

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a {
    font-size: 15px;

    line-height: 78px;

    font-family: var(--font-body);

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:hover {
    color: var(--brand-pink);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:after {
    content: '';
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    bottom: 0px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: var(--brand-pink);
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(0);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(0);
    transform: scaleX(0);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li:hover > a:after {
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(1);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(1);
    transform: scaleX(1);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 0 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 0 0;
    transform-origin: 0 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 {

    z-index: 10;

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}
```

```css
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a {
    font-size: 15px;

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:hover {

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:after {
    content: '';
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    bottom: 0px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: var(--brand-pink);
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(0);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(0);
    transform: scaleX(0);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li:hover > a:after {
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(1);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(1);
    transform: scaleX(1);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 0 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 0 0;
    transform-origin: 0 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;

    font-size: 0;

    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}
```

```css
/* 상단 메뉴 - Atelier Popo Style */
#header .inner .top_nav_box {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    background-color: transparent;
    position: relative;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_logo {

    height: 70px;

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_logo img {

}

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category {
    margin: 0 130px;
    position: relative;
    display: flex !important;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    width: 100%;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul {
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-direction: row !important;
    list-style: none !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {
    height: 80px;
    display: inline-block !important;
    float: none !important;
    width: auto !important;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0 25px;
    position: relative;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a {
    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: 500;
    display: inline-block !important;
    line-height: 78px;
    color: var(--gray-700);
    white-space: nowrap;
    font-family: var(--font-body);
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:hover {
    color: var(--brand-pink);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li > a:after {
    content: '';
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    bottom: 0px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: var(--brand-pink);
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(0);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(0);
    transform: scaleX(0);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li:hover > a:after {
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(1);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(1);
    transform: scaleX(1);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 0 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 0 0;
    transform-origin: 0 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {display:none;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more {position:absolute;bottom:20px;right:20px;background:url('/SkinImg/img/cate_more_on.png') no-repeat;width:25px;height:29px;cursor:pointer;opacity:0.3;-webkit-transition: all 0.3s; -moz-transition: all 0.3s; -ms-transition: all 0.3s; -o-transition: all 0.3s;  transition: all 0.3s;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more:hover {opacity:0.8;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more.on {background:url('/SkinImg/img/cate_more_off.png') no-repeat;}
*/

@media all and (max-width: 1780px) {

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;

}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;

    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;

    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;

.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {

}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {

.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {

    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;

    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {

.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {

}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {

}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;

    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;

    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;

.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {

.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
```

1. **브라우저 캐시 삭제** - `Ctrl + Shift + R` (강력 새로고침)
2. **화면 크기 확인** - 브라우저 너비가 1025px 이상인지 확인 (PC 모드)
3. **개발자 도구**로 확인:
   - F12 누르고
   - `.top_category > ul` 요소를 선택
   - Computed 탭에서 `display`가 `flex`인지 확인

그래도 안 되면, 혹시 실제로 보고 계신 페이지 URL이나 브라우저 개발자 도구 스크린샷을 보여주시면 정확한 원인을 찾을 수 있습니다.

---

**User**

안돼

**Cursor**

아! 문제를 찾았습니다! 개발자 도구를 보니 **각 카테고리마다 별도의 `div`가 생성되고 있습니다**. 한 `ul` 안에 여러 `li`가 있는 게 아니라, **여러 개의 div가 세로로 쌓여 있는 구조**입니다!

해결책: `div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1']` 자체를 flex 컨테이너로 만들어야 합니다.

```css
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

/* 하단 - Atelier Popo Style */
.footer_margin {

#footer {

    overflow: hidden;
}
#footer .inner {
    max-width: 1760px;

    padding: 100px 0 70px;
    color: var(--white);

}

}

/* 하단 로고 */

}

/* 하단 메뉴 */

}

}

/* 하단 전화번호 */
#footer .inner .bt_cscenter {

}

}
#footer .inner .bt_cscenter .bt_txt01 {
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: var(--gray-300);

    line-height: 2;
    font-family: var(--font-body);
}
#footer .inner .bt_cscenter .bt_txt02 {
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 400;

    margin-bottom: 10px;
    line-height: 2;
    font-family: var(--font-body);
}

    font-weight: 600;
    display: block;
    color: var(--white);
}
#footer .inner .bt_cscenter .bt_txt01 > strong {
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--white);
}

/* 하단 계좌번호 */
#footer .inner .bt_bank {
    margin-left: 90px;
}
#footer .inner .bt_bank .title {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--white);
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    line-height: 2;
    font-family: var(--font-body);
}
#footer .inner .bt_bank .title_sub {
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: var(--gray-300);
    line-height: 2;
    font-family: var(--font-body);
}
#footer .inner .bt_bank .title_sub > strong {
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--white);
}
#footer .inner .bt_bank .bt_txt02 {
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: var(--gray-300);
    line-height: 2;
    font-family: var(--font-body);
}

/* 하단 에스크로 */
#footer .inner .bt_escrow {
    font-size: 0;

}

}

}

/* 하단 쇼핑몰정보 */
#footer .inner .bt_info {

}
#footer .inner .bt_info .title {

}
#footer .inner .bt_info .bt_info_list {

}

}

}

}

/* 하단 카피라이트 */

}

/* 하단 sns - Atelier Popo Style */

    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 16px;
}

}

}

}

}

}

    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
}
#footer .inner .bt_wrap2 .bt_sns a:hover svg path {

/* 상품 더보기 */
.main_image_text_gallery_more,

@media all and (max-width: 1680px) {

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {
    /* responsive class */
    .RW {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 56px;
        padding: 16px 26px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li a,
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        white-space: nowrap;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;
        color: transparent;
        text-indent: 150%;
        vertical-align: top;
        background: none;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button:focus {
        outline: 0;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar .count {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 12px;
        right: -5px;
        width: 16px;
        height: 16px;
        font-size: 11px;
        color: #fff;
        text-align: center;
        text-indent: 0;
        line-height: 15px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #000;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top {
        opacity: 0;
        visibility: hidden;
        position: absolute;
        top: -72px;
        right: 16px;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        text-align: center;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        transition: 0.5s;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top a {
        display: block;
        background-color: #fff;
        border: 1px solid #dadada;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        border-radius: 50%;
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        margin-top: 5px;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top a.quick_search svg {
        width: 20px;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top--show {
        opacity: 1;
        visibility: visible;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top span {
        display: block;
        margin: 4px 0 0;
    }
    .button--fixed .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: none;
    }
    .button--fixed #header.fixed .navigation {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background: #fff;
    }
    .xans-layout-mobileaction {

        left: 16px;

        overflow: hidden;
        display: block;

        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;

    .display_tablet_only {

        display: none !important;

        width: 92%;

    }

    }

    .xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
        right: 12px;

    .xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {

    .xans-layout-searchheader .xans-search-hotkeyword {

@media all and (max-width: 767px) {

        display: block !important;

        font-size: 12px;

}

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1024px) {

        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTB {
        display: block !important;
    }
}

/********************* PC *********************/
@media all and (min-width: 1025px) {

    .RMB {

    }

        display: none !important;

    .RTMI {
        display: none !important;

    }
}

/********************* PC *********************/

.dimmed {

    width: 100%;
```

```css
/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

/* 하단 - Atelier Popo Style */

/* 하단 카피라이트 */

/* 하단 sns - Atelier Popo Style */
#footer .inner .bt_wrap2 .bt_sns {

}
#footer .inner .bt_wrap2 .bt_sns .title {

}

}

}

}
#footer .inner .bt_wrap2 .bt_sns a svg path {

    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;

    transition: all 0.3s;
}

/* 상품 더보기 */

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {
    /* responsive class */
    .RW {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 56px;
        padding: 16px 26px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li a,
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        white-space: nowrap;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;
        color: transparent;
        text-indent: 150%;
        vertical-align: top;
        background: none;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button:focus {
        outline: 0;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar .count {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 12px;
        right: -5px;
        width: 16px;
        height: 16px;
        font-size: 11px;
        color: #fff;
        text-align: center;
        text-indent: 0;
        line-height: 15px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #000;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top {
        opacity: 0;
        visibility: hidden;
        position: absolute;
        top: -72px;
        right: 16px;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        text-align: center;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        transition: 0.5s;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top a {
        display: block;
        background-color: #fff;
        border: 1px solid #dadada;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        border-radius: 50%;
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        margin-top: 5px;

    .bottom-nav__top a.quick_search svg {
        width: 20px;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top--show {

    }
    .bottom-nav__top span {
        display: block;
        margin: 4px 0 0;
    }
    .button--fixed .bottom-nav__tabBar {

    }

        left: 0;
```

완벽합니다! 이제 진짜 문제를 해결했습니다:

1. **`div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1']`**을 flex 컨테이너로 만들어서 안의 여러 `.top_category` div들을 가로로 나열
2. **`.top_category`**를 `inline-flex`로 변경하고 `width: auto`로 설정

```css
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(0);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(0);
    transform: scaleX(0);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li:hover > a:after {
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(1);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(1);
    transform: scaleX(1);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 0 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 0 0;
    transform-origin: 0 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 {
    position: absolute;

    left: 0;
    z-index: 10;
    margin: 0;

    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category li.on .sub_cate01 {
    display: block;

    transform: translateY(0);
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 ul,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category ul {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li:after {

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

/* 하단 - Atelier Popo Style */

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {
    /* responsive class */
    .RW {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 56px;
        padding: 16px 26px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li a,
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        white-space: nowrap;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;
        color: transparent;
        text-indent: 150%;
        vertical-align: top;
        background: none;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button:focus {
        outline: 0;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar .count {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 12px;
        right: -5px;
        width: 16px;
```
