
완료! 이제 **최대한 강력하게** 설정했습니다:
- 모든 `.top_category`를 `display: inline-block !important`로 설정
- `width: auto !important`로 강제 설정
- `vertical-align: top`으로 정렬

이제 **강력 새로고침** (`Ctrl + Shift + R`)을 해주세요!

그래도 안 되면, 브라우저 개발자 도구에서:
1. Elements 탭에서 `.top_category` 선택
2. Styles 탭에서 어떤 CSS가 `display`를 override하고 있는지 확인
3. 스크린샷 찍어서 보여주세요

완벽하게 문제를 찾았습니다! 스크린샷을 보니:

**미디어 쿼리 안에서** `.top_category`에 `display: flex !important;`가 적용되어 있어서, 각 카테고리가 **블록처럼 새로운 줄을 차지**하고 있습니다!

미디어 쿼리 부분을 수정하겠습니다:

```css
/** 오우이_style 210903 **/

    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}
```

완벽합니다! 이제 진짜 해결했습니다:

**변경 사항:**
- 미디어 쿼리에서 `.top_category`를 `display: inline-block !important;`로 변경
- `width: auto !important;`와 `margin: 0 !important;` 추가

이제 **강력 새로고침** (`Ctrl + Shift + R`)을 하면 메뉴들이 가로로 나열됩니다! 🎯

---

**User**

어우 그래도 똑같아 계속 display에 취소선이 그려저있어.. 다른방법은 없을까?

---

**Cursor**

알겠습니다! CSS 우선순위 문제가 심각하네요. 다른 접근 방법을 제안드리겠습니다:

## 대안 1: JavaScript로 DOM 재구성 (권장)
여러 개의 `.top_category` div를 하나로 합치는 방법입니다.

```javascript
// header.html이나 별도 JS 파일에 추가
$(document).ready(function() {
    var $menuContainer = $('div[data-ez-module="menu-main/1"]');
    var $categories = $menuContainer.find('.top_category');
    
    if ($categories.length > 1) {
        var $firstCategory = $categories.first();
        var $ul = $firstCategory.find('ul');
        
        $categories.slice(1).each(function() {
            $(this).find('ul > li').appendTo($ul);
            $(this).remove();
        });
    }
});
```

## 대안 2: CSS Grid 사용
Flexbox 대신 Grid로 접근:

```css
#header .inner .top_nav_box div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1'] {
    display: grid !important;
    grid-auto-flow: column !important;
    justify-content: center;
}
```

## 대안 3: Float 사용 (구식이지만 확실함)
```css
.top_category {
    float: left !important;
    clear: none !important;
}
```

## 대안 4: HTML 구조 직접 수정
`header.html`에서 여러 개의 `<li>`를 하나의 `<ul>` 안에 넣기

---

**어떤 방법을 시도해볼까요?**
1. JavaScript DOM 재구성 (가장 깔끔)
2. Float 사용 (가장 확실)
3. Grid 사용
4. HTML 구조 변경

```javascript
// header.html이나 별도 JS 파일에 추가
$(document).ready(function() {
    var $menuContainer = $('div[data-ez-module="menu-main/1"]');
    var $categories = $menuContainer.find('.top_category');
    
    if ($categories.length > 1) {
        var $firstCategory = $categories.first();
        var $ul = $firstCategory.find('ul');
        
        $categories.slice(1).each(function() {
            $(this).find('ul > li').appendTo($ul);
            $(this).remove();
        });
    }
});
```

**Cursor**

좋습니다! Float 방법을 사용하겠습니다. 이 방법은 구식이지만 CSS 우선순위 문제를 피할 수 있어서 가장 확실합니다.

## Float 방법으로 가로 배치 계획

### 수정할 내용:

```css
/* div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1'] - 컨테이너 */
#header .inner .top_nav_box div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1'] {
    width: 100% !important;
    overflow: hidden !important;
    text-align: center !important;
}

/* .top_category - 각 카테고리 div */
.top_category,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category {
    float: left !important;
    clear: none !important;
    display: block !important;
    width: auto !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

/* clearfix 추가 */
#header .inner .top_nav_box div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1']:after {
    content: "" !important;
    display: table !important;
    clear: both !important;
}
```

이 방법의 장점:
- ✅ Flexbox보다 우선순위가 낮아서 덮어쓰기 쉬움
- ✅ 구형 브라우저에서도 작동
- ✅ CSS만으로 해결 (JavaScript 불필요)

**바로 적용할까요?**

```css
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {
    /* responsive class */
    .RW {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 56px;
        padding: 16px 26px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li a,
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        white-space: nowrap;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;
        color: transparent;
        text-indent: 150%;
        vertical-align: top;
        background: none;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button:focus {
        outline: 0;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar .count {
        display: block;

        text-align: center;
        text-indent: 0;

        border-radius: 50%;

    .bottom-nav__top {

        text-align: center;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        transition: 0.5s;

        display: flex;

        align-items: center;
        margin-top: 5px;

/********************* Tablet *********************/

        display: none !important;
    }

        display: block !important;

}

/********************* PC *********************/
@media all and (min-width: 1025px) {

    .RTMI {
        display: none !important;

        display: none !important;
    }
}

/********************* PC *********************/
```

```css
}

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {
    /* responsive class */
    .RW {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 56px;
        padding: 16px 26px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li a,
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        white-space: nowrap;

        height: 24px;

        line-height: 1px;
        color: transparent;
        text-indent: 150%;
        vertical-align: top;

        text-align: center;
        text-indent: 0;
        line-height: 15px;
        border-radius: 50%;

    .bottom-nav__top {

        text-align: center;
```

```css
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category li.on .sub_cate01 {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category {

    background-color: var(--white);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 ul,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category ul {

    padding: 10px 0;

}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li.on > ul,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li.on > ul {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li {

    padding: 0 10px 0 10px;
}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li:after,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;

    margin-top: -3px;

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li.noChild:after,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li.noChild:after {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub_cate01 li a,
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .sub-category li a {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_mypage {

#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category > ul > li {display:none;}
#header .inner .top_nav_box .top_category .cate_more {position:absolute;bottom:20px;right:20px;background:url('/SkinImg/img/cate_more_on.png') no-repeat;width:25px;height:29px;cursor:pointer;opacity:0.3;-webkit-transition: all 0.3s; -moz-transition: all 0.3s; -ms-transition: all 0.3s; -o-transition: all 0.3s;  transition: all 0.3s;}

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

#footer .inner .bt_bank .title {

#footer .inner .bt_bank .title_sub {

}

}

/********************* Tablet *********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1024px) {
    /* responsive class */
    .RW {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .RTMB {
        display: block !important;
    }
    .RTMI {
        display: inline-block !important;
    }
    #capp-shop-new-product-optionselect-layer {
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        left: auto !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .bottom-nav {
        z-index: 901;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 56px;
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        box-shadow: 0 -2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    }
    .bottom-nav--hide {
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 56px;
        padding: 16px 26px 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
        transition: transform 0.3s linear, padding-bottom 0.3s linear;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li a,
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        white-space: nowrap;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;
        color: transparent;
        text-indent: 150%;
        vertical-align: top;
        background: none;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar li button:focus {
        outline: 0;
    }
    .bottom-nav__tabBar .count {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 12px;
        right: -5px;
        width: 16px;
        height: 16px;
        font-size: 11px;
        color: #fff;
        text-align: center;
        text-indent: 0;
        line-height: 15px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #000;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top {
        opacity: 0;
        visibility: hidden;
        position: absolute;
        top: -72px;
        right: 16px;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        text-align: center;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        transition: 0.5s;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top a {
        display: block;
        background-color: #fff;
        border: 1px solid #dadada;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        border-radius: 50%;
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        margin-top: 5px;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top a.quick_search svg {
        width: 20px;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top--show {
        opacity: 1;
        visibility: visible;
    }
    .bottom-nav__top span {
        display: block;
        margin: 4px 0 0;
    }
    .button--fixed .bottom-nav__tabBar {
        display: none;
    }
    .button--fixed #header.fixed .navigation {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background: #fff;
    }
    .xans-layout-mobileaction {
        position: absolute;
        top: 45px;
        left: 16px;
    }
    .xans-layout-mobileaction a {
        overflow: hidden;
        display: block;
        text-indent: -150%;
        color: transparent;
        font-size: 1px;
        line-height: 1px;
        white-space: nowrap;

```

완료했습니다! Float 방법으로 수정했습니다.

**변경 사항:**
1. `div[data-ez-module='menu-main/1']`:
   - `display: block` + `overflow: hidden` (clearfix)
   - `text-align: center` (가운데 정렬)

2. `.top_category`:
   - `float: left !important` (가로 배치)
   - `clear: none !important` (줄바꿈 방지)
   - `display: block !important`

3. `:after` pseudo-element로 clearfix 추가

이제 **강력 새로고침** (`Ctrl + Shift + R`)을 해주세요!

Float는 Flexbox보다 오래된 속성이라 CSS 우선순위 충돌을 피할 수 있습니다. 이제 메뉴들이 가로로 나열될 겁니다! 🎯

---

**User**

잘 되는데 글자가 너무 왼쪽으루 치우쳐저있어 중앙이 아니라.

---

**Cursor**

아! Float는 왼쪽 정렬이 기본이라 그렇습니다. 중앙 정렬로 수정하겠습니다.

```css
}

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}

/* 하단 - Atelier Popo Style */

}
#footer .inner {

}
```

```css
    -webkit-transform: scaleX(0);
    -ms-transform: scaleX(0);
    transform: scaleX(0);
    -webkit-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -ms-transform-origin: 100% 0;
    transform-origin: 100% 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);

    -ms-transform-origin: 0 0;
    transform-origin: 0 0;
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
    -o-transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);

    transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96), -webkit-transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.45, 0.46, 0.05, 0.96);
}

/* 상단검색 레이어 */
.xans-layout-searchheader {
    z-index: 1001;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    background: #fff;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0.5s;
    height: 389px;
}
.searchExpand .xans-layout-searchheader {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
    transition: opacity 0.5s ease, transform 0.5s ease, visibility 0s linear 0s;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}
.searchExpand .dimmed {
    display: block;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .title {
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #3a3a3a;
    margin: 103px 0 54px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch {
    background: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    margin: 15px 0 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnSearch .icon {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .btnClose {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    right: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-indent: 150%;
    font-size: 1px;
    color: transparent;
    line-height: 1px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset {
    display: flex;
    width: 650px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader #keyword {
    width: 100%;
    height: 54px;
    padding: 15px 0;
    flex: 1;
    font-size: 18px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 0;
    background: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:before {
    right: 17px;
    height: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .icon.icoClose:after {
    top: 17px;
    width: 35px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop {
    display: none;
    border: 1px solid #565960;
    position: absolute;
    width: 187px;
    text-align: left;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 20;
    overflow: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    max-height: 100px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #1c1c1c;
    font-family: GulimChe, Gulim;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li a:hover,
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .autoDrop li.selected a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #fff;
    background: #a1a4ae;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 30px auto 0;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li {
    margin: 0 10px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #8a8a8a;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1;
    border: 1px solid #f4f4f4;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 13px 14px 11px 14px;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s;
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s;
    -ms-transition: all 0.3s;
    -o-transition: all 0.3s;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 40px;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader .hot_keyword li a:hover {
    color: #1a1a1a;
    border: 1px solid #1a1a1a;
    background-color: #fff;
}
.xans-layout-searchheader fieldset .btnDelete {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 0;
    width: 20px;
    height: 58px;
    background: url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/layout/btn_delete.png') no-repeat 0 center;
    background-size: 20px;
}
```

완료! Float를 제거하고 `inline-block`으로 변경했습니다.

**변경 사항:**
- `.top_category`: `float` 제거 → `display: inline-block !important`
- 부모 요소의 `text-align: center`가 이제 작동합니다

이제 새로고침하면 메뉴들이 **중앙에 정렬**됩니다! 🎯
